definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: extend, spread (Ar. t.afah.a  be full to overflowing, abound; Aram. t.pah. extend, spread; [[טְפוּחָא]] a step, foot-length; NH [[טֶפַח]] a span (cf. [[טֶפַח]] infr.))—
spread out the heavens Is 48:13 (‖[[יׇסְֽדָה ארץ]]).
denom. fr. [[טֶפַח]] carry on the palms, dandle La 2:22 (‖[[רִבִּיתִי]] I have brought up, reared).
